name: Rise of The Fey
storyline:
In Rise of The Fey, Kall Braveheart, a young lumberjack from Mistyday Crater, is the only survivor from an attack from Brazul Dul' Waru on his village. After the attack, Kall finds his beloved Kaia, his childhood friend and lover, dead.
Consumed with anger, Kall will jorney on a path of vengeance to find a lost power and avenge Kaia's death.

The main storyline will also tackle themes like depression, regret and power corruption.
summary:
Rise of The Fey is a third-person action-adventure RPG set within a fantasy world called Perrah.
In Rise you control Kall, a young spaunian looking for revenge after the death of his beloved.
